solution_line_template: If it takes {time_per_worm_minutes} minutes to find each worm, then he catches {minutes_per_hour}/{time_per_worm_minutes} = <<{minutes_per_hour}/{time_per_worm_minutes}={worms_per_hour}>>{worms_per_hour} worms per hour.
If he feeds each toad {worms_per_toad} worms, then he has {total_worms_caught}/{worms_per_toad} = <<{total_worms_caught}/{worms_per_toad}={number_of_toads}>>{number_of_toads} toads in his shoebox.
